content.prompt: In the last sentence of the sixth paragraph (“Reena . . . quill”), the narrator conveys Reena’s perspective on her family’s reaction to her name change by evoking the image of her

choices.label: mocking her listeners by questioning their spelling abilities
writing her new name permanently on her listeners’ consciousness
drawing a boundary between herself and the narrator
pretending not to hear her family when they call her by her old name

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
